coreAttributes.name: Colour Test T-shirt
coreAttributes.description: A unisex fabric shirt, named after the T shape of its body and sleeves. It has a horrific colour pattern, and should only be used for testing purposes.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the T-shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc.her] head.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the T-shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the T-shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.
[npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt back down, covering [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] T-shirt up to just below [npc.her] chin, fully exposing [npc.her] torso.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] torso.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] torso.
